DOC.brief_summary: The Men Move Study randomize , control , feasibility study design address health problem physical inactivity old men .
DOC.detailed_description: Men Move randomize , control , feasibility study provide preliminary evidence feasibility efficacy promote mobility uptake physical activity among men age 65 year old physically inactive . Specifically , Men Move evaluate effect choice-based physical activity model pair active transportation model . The choice-based physical activity model encourage old men use exist community-based resource create implement action plan physical activity . It also provide ongoing face-to-face telephone-based support train activity coach . The active transportation model provide transit pass active travel planning promote use transit walk destination interest . The feasibility deliver intervention assess . Accelerometry travel diary use measure effect intervention physical activity .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 65 year age old ; 2. identify man ; 3 . English speaking ; 4. demonstrate readiness physical activity ( PAR‐Q+ questionnaire letter recommendation physician ) 1. perform ≥75 minute moderate‐to‐vigourous intensity physical activity past week ; 2. participate strength training past 3 month ; 3. participate aerobic exercise class past 3 month ; 4. live nursing home assist living facility ; 5. plan town 7 day 12‐week intervention period .
